entry.title: My First Post Success
entry.content:
After around 20hrs+ I push my hexo page online success

At 2019 I try to deploy my personal blog on github page with hexo SSG. I put around 10hrs+ to learn about it. I fail to push my local files online.

I give up and forget it.

In this time, I encourted the same sitution like 5 years ago, but we have ChatGpt now. I copy the error msg to chatgpt when I fail. But it doesn’t work for me. Because I don’t really understand the git concept and contrl command.I try to deploy again and again that drive me crazy and angry. I feel some frustrated but I keep going.
But the advantage I understand how github operate more and feel inteserting.
Trying to find some relate tutorial artical. Finally I
meet Moon Jam’s Blog , I try to follow it step by step and mark down the error msg then try to figure out what is it (this might call “deBug”).

5 years ago at 2024, I did it eventually. And I’m here to begin my life recording.

The reason is what I try to finish those commitment by myself.

Beginning and the end.

In this try & error road, I feel frustrated disappointed. But I trust this is a progress, I try to accept the progress and believe it (It’s very important). The driving force is what I want. NOT what I “should” suppose to.
So I try to using my broken english to record this true feeling in my life. And I love to keep going on this interesting road.

THANKYOU

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
